diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is $x$.
The length of the line $AC$ is $y$.
The length of the line $BD$ is $12.5$.
The length of the line $AD$ is $8$.
The length of the line $BC$ is $z$.
The point $D$ lies on the line $AB$.
The line $CA$ is perpendicular to the line $CB$.
The line $DC$ is perpendicular to the line $DB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming the triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $AD$, $BD$, and $CD$, forming the triangle $ACD$.
